text: Bristol Rovers F.C. is a football club which plays in Bristol, People who live in North Bristol traditionally support Bristol Rovers, however people you live in South Bristol support their fierce rivals Bristol City F.C. ==Name== *1883-1884 Black Arabs F.C. *1884-1897 Eastville Rovers F.C. *1897-1898 Bristol Eastville Rovers F.C. *1898-present Bristol Rovers ==League position== Season League Position 2010/11 League One 22nd 2011/12 League Two 13th 2012/13 League Two 14th 2013/14 League Two 23rd ===Former position=== Category:English football clubs Category:1883 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Bristol Rovers F.C.
